channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My take on the $895 Amex Platinum: Is the price hike worth the added perks?

item.title: Amex Platinum Card review: Steep annual fee but loads of new perks to match
item.description: The Platinum Card from American Express offers high-end travel perks but comes with a steep annual fee. Here's what you need to know to decide if you ...

item.title: What it’s like flying Aer Lingus' Airbus A321XLR to Ireland
item.description: A practical guide to Aer Lingus’ A321XLR on routes from Ireland to the U.S., including where it flies, the best seats, Wi‑Fi, meals and how to book wi...

item.title: Southwest card welcome bonuses: Earn 120,000 points with this best-ever business card offer
item.description: You can earn a lot of points with Southwest Airlines credit cards thanks, in part, to their current welcome bonus offers. Here are the details.

item.title: American Express Platinum: Valuable new benefits and an offer as high as 175,000 bonus points
